vehicles.description: Red car on the left side of the ego car, slightly ahead and in an adjacent lane, seemingly moving in the same direction
vehicles.explanation: The proximity and movement of this vehicle may influence the ego car's lane choice and speed regulation.

vehicles.description: Large white truck on the right, parked by the side of the road with part of it extending slightly onto the road
vehicles.explanation: The truck's position can cause reduced road width and potential obstruction, requiring the ego car to maintain a safe distance and possibly adjust its trajectory.

traffic lights.description: Distant traffic light visible ahead, displaying a red signal
traffic lights.explanation: The red light indicates that the ego car will have to come to a stop at the intersection ahead.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there are two visible vehicles and one traffic light of interest. A red car is positioned slightly ahead on the left side of the ego car in an adjacent lane, moving in the same direction. This could affect the ego car's lane choice and speed regulation due to its proximity and movement. Additionally, there is a large white truck parked by the side of the road on the right, with part of it extending onto the road, creating a potential obstruction that requires the ego car to maintain a safe distance and possibly adjust its trajectory. Further ahead, a traffic light is displaying a red signal, indicating that the ego car will need to stop at the upcoming intersection.

2.description and explanation: A large vehicle designed for transportation of cargo, commonly known as a truck. Given its size and potential slow maneuverability, the ego car should maintain a safe following distance and be prepared for slower acceleration and longer stopping distances from the truck. Overtaking should be done with caution, ensuring there is ample space and visibility ahead.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a safe distance from the vehicle ahead, prepare to stop at the red traffic light, and adjust speed to account for wet road conditions. Also, be cautious of the large truck on the right to avoid any obstructions it may cause.
